item.title: Human Model Start (UPDATED!)
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:34, topic:329604”]Seeings as how MBB modeled a car fine and a human horribly i think that shows that cars are easier. It depends on how much detail you’re going for though.


Thats a veyron that i made about 2 months ago and im still getting frustrated with it.

Thats a marine i made about 4-5 months ago.

It really depends on the effort you put forward.[/quote]you got it right but not completely, modeling a human is different from modeling a car and you should know it, its expierience, i model cars, its easy to me, i always modeled cars, but I never modeled humans, I’m not use to that, I HAVE NO EXPIERIENCE with humans= suck

Read full topic

item.title: Human Model Start (UPDATED!)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Seeings as how MBB modeled a car fine and a human horribly i think that shows that cars are easier. It depends on how much detail you’re going for though.


Thats a veyron that i made about 2 months ago and im still getting frustrated with it.

Thats a marine i made about 4-5 months ago.

It really depends on the effort you put forward.

Read full topic

item.title: Human Model Start (UPDATED!)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:28, topic:329604”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=425983.msg3131542#msg3131542 date=1266545705]

[quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=425983.msg3131358#msg3131358 date=1266533051]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=425983.msg3131354#msg3131354 date=1266532952]

[quote author=the wanderer link=topic=425983.msg3130017#msg3130017 date=1266385321]
Actually a lot harder. A car is very primitive shaped. A human body isn’t. A human body is rounded and a car isn’t. I give A+ on effort on neck I like the updated body. Before it kind of looked too bulbous. Prolly better than I could do.
[/quote]Thanks
[/quote]tbh, i modeled a human (u can see it in the models section) and it maybe not so good but cars are definitly harder than that.
[/quote]Lol, if you modeled a great car and a bad human, what does this mean? The car was easier.
[/quote]no it means that i have more expierience with cars, take a pilot for example, lets say a pilot that cant swim, its obivous swimming is the easiest but he has no expiereince with it, hes more expierienced with flying planes so his plane skills are better than his swimming skills but that doesnt make flying a plane easier than swimming…[/quote]Yes, but piloting and swimming are two completely different things. It doesn’t matter, modeling a car or a human, it’s still modeling.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:30, topic:329604”]@JIMB - I just still cant get over the fact your surfing the model.

@MistaBigBoss - It is debatable on what is easier. For example, the Nissan Cube, that would be a fairly easy vehicle to model. As for, a car with more to it, for example:

would be harder than a human, to a point.[/quote]Well, then again modeling the insides of a human along with the surface would be even harder.
Yea, I’m learning to use subsurf. It’s very useful in the long run.
I would self-smooth but it was way to much to cut and drag.

Read full topic

Actually a lot harder. A car is very primitive shaped. A human body isn’t. A human body is rounded and a car isn’t. I give A+ on effort on neck I like the updated body. Before it kind of looked too bulbous. Prolly better than I could do.

[/quote]tbh, i modeled a human (u can see it in the models section) and it maybe not so good but cars are definitly harder than that.
[/quote]Lol, if you modeled a great car and a bad human, what does this mean? The car was easier.[/quote]no it means that i have more expierience with cars, take a pilot for example, lets say a pilot that cant swim, its obivous swimming is the easiest but he has no expiereince with it, hes more expierienced with flying planes so his plane skills are better than his swimming skills but that doesnt make flying a plane easier than swimming…

item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=425983.msg3129791#msg3129791 date=1266360377]

[quote author=0bbyme link=topic=425983.msg3129337#msg3129337 date=1266299237]
great start but the head is starting to get really crazy.
[/quote]Yea scratch that neck. I messed up, so it looks like a gummy bear neck. Lol…
[/quote]the whole thing looks like a gummy bear, you need to add extra resolution to the sides so when you render it you get a nice sharp but still realistic guy
[/quote]I haven’t applied any mats to it… I’m going to add textures for the small details, etc.
[/quote]gl

edit: ima try to model a human 2, never tried it before[/quote]It’s alot harder than a car.
